summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2129, for the improvement of West 60th Street from 17th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by regrading, curbing, constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21373 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
